nodes.text: Tiyuu'cha Mahlor was a Minyavish male who served as senator of Qaras. In 44 ABY, he was exiled after the uprising of the slaves on Qaras along with the rest of his people. This revolution had been instigated by the organization Freedom Flight, which was secretly founded by Moff Drikl Lecersen to follow through the resulting crises by Chief of State Natasi Daala of the Galactic Alliance. He was first tortured then killed by Lecersen's IT-O Interrogator droid after the interrogator had successfully obtained a code from Mahlor to his safe-deposit box, where Mahlor stored compromising materials to Lecersen's Conspiracy group.
